text: Always merge to dev and never to master -- EVE will merge into master for you automatically.
description: It is never a good idea to merge into `master` in any of the Storm Enroute projects. Instead, you should always merge or submit pull requests to the `dev` branch. If a project builds successfully, the EVE bot will automatically do the merge to `master`. This way the `master` branch almost always builds correctly and other projects can depend on it.

text: Create topic/XXX branches to implement new features.
description: Once you are done working on the new feature in your `topic/XXX` branch you can merge it into the `dev` branch. From there on it will be tested and merged further by the bot automatically.
